faqs.question: Who is eligible for SOSF programs?
faqs.answer: SOSF programs are open to at-risk youth ages 8-18. We work with schools, social workers, and community organizations to identify participants.

faqs.question: How can my gym become a partner?
faqs.answer: Gyms interested in partnering can apply through our website. We look for facilities committed to youth development and willing to provide subsidized training.

faqs.question: Are donations tax-deductible?
faqs.answer: Yes! SOSF is a registered 501(c)(3) non-profit organization. All donations are tax-deductible to the fullest extent allowed by law.

faqs.question: How can I volunteer?
faqs.answer: We welcome volunteers as mentors, coaches, and administrative support. Visit our Get Involved page to learn more and apply.
